alert.note: Alert for Houston; Montgomery; Stewart (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 4:46PM CDT until April 13 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Montgomery County in Middle Tennessee... Stewart County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern Houston County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 445 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Land Between The Lakes Area to 8 miles east of Murray to Paris, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dover, Erin, Clarksville, Tennessee Ridge, Big Rock, Cumberland City, Land Between The Lakes, Houston County Airport, Indian Mound and Woodlawn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
